question:
You are planning to go on a holiday in an English-speaking country where one of your friend resides. Please write him a letter and let him know about the upcoming trip. In your letter;
- Ask for recommendations for place to visit during your trip.
- Ask about accommodations.
- Advice on program that you and your friend can do together once you will meet him
text: I hope this letter finds you well. Sorry I have not written for a while. I am writing to inform you about my upcoming trip to England.

In fact, I am planning a two-week trip next month, so I need your guidance about tourist attractions in your country. In addition, I like to visit some eye-catching scenery on England's islands, please send me  the details of some of the most beautiful ones.
Indeed, I did not reserve any hotel and I will postpone it to ask you about the best one. I appreciate your suggestion about my accommodation.

We have not seen each other for a long time and I will be glad if I can visit you during my journey. Surprisingly, my trip is enough long, therefore I can alter my programme and visit your city whenever you are free.
Do write back soon. Give your parents my regards.
